items.title: Why Elon Musk’s Weirdly Halting Optimus Robot Just Got Panned on X
items.description: One person wrote: ‘This might literally be the worst humanoid robot demo I have seen!’

items.title: Why We Teach All Employees to Lead, no Matter Their Role
items.description: As an employee-owned company, leadership has to be shared.

items.title: How Formula 1 Inspires Successful Business Transformation
items.description: Five principles from the fastest teams on the planet to help your company move faster, smarter, and more in sync.

items.title: This CEO Will Not Be Joining Trump’s Tech Dinner Tonight
items.description: Trump will host top tech CEOs at a White House dinner tonight. But one notable name is absent from the guest list.

items.title: If You’re Using Microsoft Teams, Beware: Hackers Could be Targeting Your Company
items.description: Zoom is affected too. It’s an ideal moment to remind your staff that good cybersecurity is an ongoing discipline, not a one-off issue.
